location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Rough Sketch Map Illustrating the Defence of Shaiba on 12th April 1915 and Apparent Movements of the Turkish Forces’

mods.abstract: Imprint:General Staff India. S.D.O. No. 1242, June, 1915.Distinctive Features:Sketch map of Shaiba and surrounding area issued as an ‘Appendix B’ to illustrate British military operations on 12th April 1915 showing the British and enemy forces with guns positionS indicated.Bottom right hand corner: ‘(Sd.) E.G. Dunn, Captain, Brigade Major 18th Infantry Brigade 19-4-1915’.Marked ‘For Official Use Only’.
